<Susanne Uhlen

Text: Susanne Uhlen:  She is the daughter of actor Wolfgang Kieling, best known as being the voice of "Bert", of the "Sesame Street" duo Bert and Ernie, and German actress Gisela Uhlen, niece to German actor Max Schreck of "Nosferatu" fame.
